title: Project fiora?
body:
https://cdn.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/001/070/762/large/paul-kwon-cyborg-ninja-low-rez-01.jpg?1439401091

maybe a **rejected concept**? it have a** 06 **on the helmet....is from zeronis artstation.

edit:
**this is not a fan art...is from zeronis a concept art artist that work on riot....on his deviantart page he says:**

**"An Original character made for my friend Rachel. 
I'm a big fan of Cyborg ninjas in anime and games."**
http://zeronis.deviantart.com

In artstation doesnt said that....so my bad on that! Sorry.
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/cyborg-78af6184-b9b0-4505-bbd8-70a7b9753587

I posted it, because Project skins are inspired by the Metal gear series....this design reminds me of Raiden....plus it have a 06 on the helmet, and the hexagons/triangles are all over the place...coincidence? .

I thought it would be fiora, because of the 06 trace description....plus Project Fiora is a popular concept that have been around on boards.......and I mean she have a skin where she smack ppl with a ruler, so they can change her weapon a bit....for her hairstyle, MF VU, they changed her hairstyle in different skins....mafia/waterloo/captain have different hairstyles.

> ClockHead:
Based on the teaser update, the blade looks stunningly similar, so it's likely what her skin was based off of.
> https://i.gyazo.com/ec40da5395d396ac09a635b3d8bd6a05.png

http://a.disquscdn.com/uploads/mediaembed/images/2408/7105/original.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/kGfoq.gif

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/08/project.html .... moonbeat comment.

Seriously though, this skin is beautiful but it would make Fiora so pathetically weak. Like, how are we supposed to play LoL one-handed?
ROFL i see what u did there

The hair looks too much like Diana.
I guess Diana is getting a haircut!
Now she can be in the club with DJ Sona and Frostblade Irelia

>this is not a fan art...is from zeronis a concept art artist that work on riot.

The thing is that_ it is _**fanart**. It was a comission that Zeronis had received from someone.

Not any piece from an artist that works for a game company must be related to a game for that company, you know...

-_-

**EDIT- Facebook link of the piece:**

https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10105352994537931&set=a.10102802123064811.1073741825.10036669&type=1&theater

> https://www.patreon.com/posts/3149990

> **Did this for Rachel Rakowski**
A cyborg lady samurai or ninja...with russian Rakowski written on the leg. 
Dat booty tho. Anyways, Full HD video Process of this character is available on Patreon. Thanks for the support to help me bring these contents!

-_-

**EDIT 2:**

And no, Rachel Rakowski **(the one who commissioned Paul for the piece through his Patreon)** is _not_ a Rioter or anything.
Welp, time to give my right arm another workout... {{champion:23}}
i want to motorboat my face inbetween dat arse
Oh gosh I hope so that's pretty cool

Based on the teaser update, the blade looks stunningly similar, so it's likely what her skin was based off of.
https://i.gyazo.com/ec40da5395d396ac09a635b3d8bd6a05.png
Guys... it has nothing to do with LoL (click pic since the Deviantart link keeps turning into a picture)  http://zeronis.deviantart.com/art/Cyborg-Ninja-553226918?q=gallery%3AZeroNis&qo=2
Id tap that. Uh i mean id buy that...
I would instabuy just for DAT ASS
She needs a rapier style sword, not katana style.
I've never understood why people think she can use a rapier, dueling isn't just fencing and if she's truly such s great duelist she'll be well trained in several styles

Yes a European duelist practicing an oriental fighting style.  Makes sense, and fencing is done with a foil not a rapier/epee which Fiora uses.  Even with that rapier/epee is a thrusting style of sword play while katana is slashing.  Fiora poking around with a katana would just be stupid.
I'm assuming you've never played Fiora, most of her attacks are slashes only her crit and q is a stab.
Parry is a stab
K well my bad 2 attacks and crit is a stab, but everything else is slashes. And yasuo stabs with his katana so I don't really see why it's a big deal if she used a different sword.

Every sword can thrust and slash obviously, rapier just specializes at thrusting while katana specializes at slashing.  Of course her auto attacks aren't going to be thrusts her abilities highlight her weapon style (q and w thrust).
i mean they can give her a katana, I mean she smacks people  with a Ruler for christs sake
It does not look like Fiora because it's not  Fiora it's a  Original character
Yasssssss. Rito please
that doesn't even have fiora's hair

Guys, [it's just a thing he drew for a friend (check the description)](http://zeronis.deviantart.com/art/Cyborg-Ninja-553226918 ). It has no relation to Fiora or even the PROJECT skins.

Not to mention this looks nothing like Fiora

This looks really cool, but it doesn't feel like Project Fiora to me.

Namely he bangs are gone, her sword was changed to more of a katana than a rapier, and her cape is gone, among other things that don't make it look much like Fiora.

Skin tight suit.
I like.
;D

The sword does not fit,the hair does not fit,her ass is obsiously too "visible".I think more armor and more cybernetic features on her would be better honestly.I believe her mouth should be hide but she still should have her hair in front of her eyes with just a very little spot where we could see her glowing red eye.Just my opinion tho, but other than that as i said,i don't think the sword and the hair are very "Fiora"
Then who is it? It says 06 and no other female uses a lithe sword like hers
Diana?
I would have sex with that skin.
I mean, there's a good chance she's just gonna look like Mistral from Metal Gear.
i mean idk how everyone thinks this is a fanart of fiora when its obviously a genderbent genji from overwatch are you serious guys

Dang, yours and Riot's look so alike!!!
Edit: oops, not yours, someone else's...
*sniffs* I smell Warframe.

Riot is going to announce Trace 6 is Fiora, and people are still going to be like, "So it's Diana? No wait, Master Yi? Irelia?????" We should stop trying to talk sense to them. They don't want to hear it.

That Salem gif is so accurate when I'm rereading some of these ridiculous posts. On the upside, we got an amazing skin coming my fellow Fiora peeps!

i think fiora will to have a project skin and also belive she will not have a new skin for a while
but good concept  btw keep going
nah she is reworked now expect more skins like chosen fiora or french maid
It looks cool enough...but are the super double D cups really necessary?
thats the art style calm down they just tits
holy shit, take ALL my money, how much do you want i got a blank check!
Zero-suit Fiora?
sword doesn't work, as it looks like a slashing weapon, but rest looks sick
I like it except that fiora is supposed to weild a rapier or estoc or the like, not a katana. Also project yasou has a large red/orange palette but you went with blue for some reason.
Why are people up voting this and still posting project idea when the skin line is about to be filled. ..?
More like Project: Fiorass

I really hope it is a project Fiora skin. But Id rather have them show no hair at all than change her hair that drastically. 
#\#SaveFiorasHair
